name: outlook-event-sso-naa
title: Outlook event-based add-in using SSO with nested app authentication
shortDescription: This sample shows how to implement SSO in an Outlook event-based add-in.
longDescription: This sample shows how to implement SSO in an event in an Outlook add-in by using nested app authentication.

references.name: Use SSO in events in an Outlook add-in using nested app authentication
references.description: This sample shows how to implement SSO in an event in an Outlook add-in by using nested app authentication.
